home.slogan:
Standing quietly in a corner of bustling Taipei,
we offer heartwarming cuisine
and cozy service.
Had a long day? You must be tired!
Welcome back to JIA~

contact.address: Address: No. 163-1, Sec. 5, Minsheng E. Rd., Songshan Dist., Taipei City

login.empty: Login failed, please check your input

content.newsItem1: The new spring menu will be available soon, bringing a new gourmet experience!
content.newsItem2: JIA Izakaya's third anniversary, 15% off on all meals!
content.newsItem3: Every Wednesday Ladies Night, female customers enjoy special discounts!
content.newsItem4: Join us for a special Sake Tasting event this Saturday with limited edition sake varieties!
content.newsItem5: Experience a seasonal omakase menu curated by our chef for one week only!
content.newsItem6: Celebrate Golden Week with us and enjoy 10% off all dishes!
content.newsItem7: Bring your dad for a special dinner and enjoy a complimentary sake sampler on Father's Day!
content.newsItem8: Join us every weekday from 5-7 PM for half-price drinks during Happy Hour!
content.newsItem9: Celebrate the season with our Summer Matsuri Feast, featuring special dishes and live entertainment!
content.newsItem10: Every Friday night is Karaoke Night! Sing your favorite songs and enjoy exclusive drink specials!

about.title: About Us
about.description1: As city lights illuminate the evening, JIA quietly awaits you in a corner of Taipei.
about.description2: Beyond the bustling streets, you'll find a warm sense of belonging.
about.description3: We offer not just food, but cherish the story and heart behind each dish.
about.description4: Our chef selects seasonal ingredients, creating Japanese-inspired delicacies with delicate techniques,
about.description5: bringing you a dining experience that interweaves refinement with warmth.
about.description6: Whether for a relaxing drink or sharing with loved ones, JIA is your ideal choice.
about.description7: Here, you'll feel the warmth and comfort of home, allowing your tired soul a moment of respite.
about.description8: If you yearn for a moment of tranquility, welcome back to JIA, sit down, savor slowly,
